Waterloo.Cedar Valley Arboretum & Botanic Gardens:
The Cedar Valley Arboretum and Botanic Gardens was founded in 1966 and is located directly East of Hawkeye Community College in Waterloo, Iowa.


== History ==
The Arboretum was started by a group of community members wanting a green space in the Waterloo-Cedar Falls metropolitan area. The firm of Buettner and Associates, Inc.
